description.value:
While those who appreciate bagpipes may like the sound of this gray reed and black leather instrument, its real purpose is to sow turmoil against a performer's enemies, spreading discord with each note. While playing the bagpipes, you gain a +1 item bonus to Performance checks and to Intimidation checks made to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Demoralize]{Demoralize}.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Daze]{Daze}
  • 1st@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Bane]{Bane}
  • 2nd@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Deafness]{Deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Knock]{Knock}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shatter]{Shatter}
  • 3rd@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Agonizing Despair]{Agonizing Despair}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Paralyze]{Paralyze}
  • 4th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Confusion]{Confusion}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Painful Vibrations]{Painful Vibrations}
  • 5th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Banishment]{Banishment}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Crushing Despair]{Crushing Despair}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Synaptic Pulse]{Synaptic Pulse}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
